column3: EWURADZE na ɔsomaa me dɛ membɛsera wo ngo menhyɛ wo hen wɔ me man Israel do: dɛm ntsi afei tsie EWURADZE ne nsɛm."
Mahyɛ dza Amalek dze yɛɛ Israel no nsew
column4: mbrɛ ɔyɛe ma mber a ofi Egypt reba no

column2: "Na Saul frɛɛ ɔman no hyiae na ɔkaan hɔn wɔ Telaim
column3: anamɔnmufo mpemahaenu
column4: na Juda mbarimba mpemdu."

column2: "Na Saul baa Amalek kurow no ho
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ atsɛweefo wɔ bɔnsa no mu."
Hom nkɔ

column6: aber a wofi Egypt reba no. Na Kenfo no fii Amalekfo no mu kɔree."

column2: "Na Saul kunkum Amalekfo no fi Havila dɛ edze rokɔ Sur a ɔwɔ Egypt enyim no."

column3: na ɔdze afona sɛɛ ɔman no nyinara pasapasa."

column5: "Menu moho dɛ mehyɛɛ Saul hen: osiandɛ oegyaa m’ekyir dzi reyɛ dza ɔnoara pɛ
column6: na ɔamma me mbrasɛm enntsim. Na Samuel no bo fuuw dodoodow
column7: na osui frɛɛ EWURADZE anadwe no nyinara."

column2: "Na Samuel soɛɛr ahanamakye dɛ orikehyia Saul anapa no; na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Samuel dɛ
column3: Saul baa Karmel
column4: na

column2: "Na Samuel baa Saul hɔ; na Saul see no dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nhyira wo: medzi EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm do."
Na nguan su a ogu m’asomu yi
column4: na anantwi su a metse yi ase nye dɛn?"

column3: Wɔdze hɔn fi Amalekfo mu bae: osiandɛ ɔman no gyaa nguan na anantwi mu dza oye dodow no dɛ wɔdze robɔbɔ okum afɔr ama EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; na nkaa no dze yɛasɛɛ no pasapasa."
Tsie ɛ
column4: na menka dza EWURADZE aka akyerɛ me anadwe yi menkyerɛ wo. Na Saul buaa no dɛ

column4: ana wɔnnyɛɛ wo Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw do otsitsir bi a? Na EWURADZE seraa wo ngo hyɛɛ wo Israel do hen;"

column2: "na EWURADZE somaa wo ɔkwan bi see dɛ
column3: Kɔ na kɛsɛɛ Amalekfo ndzebɔnyɛfo no pasapasa
column4: na nye hɔn nko araa kɛpem dɛ ebɛhyew hɔn ase."

column3: Ana EWURADZE wɔ pɛ kɛse wɔ ɔhyew afɔr na okum afɔr mu

column3: Mayɛ bɔn: osiandɛ mato EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm
column4: na wo nsɛm; dɛ musuroo dɔm no na mitsiee hɔn:"

column3: meserɛ wo

column3: Merennye wo nnsan nnkɔ: osiandɛ apow EWURADZE n’asɛm
column4: na EWURADZE apow wo dɛ eyɛ ɔhen wɔ Israel do."

column2: "Na Samuel daan noho dɛ ɔrokɔ ara
column3: nna Saul tamee suoo ne bataker no ne nsiase no mu
column4: na ɔtsewee."

column3: Ndɛ da yi EWURADZE atsew Israel ahendzi no efi wo nsamu
column4: na ɔdze ama wo nyɛnko bi a oye sen wo."

column2: "Na eso Israel Tumfo no rinndzi ator na orunnu noho so: osiandɛ ɔnnyɛ nyimpa na oeenu noho."

column3: Mayɛ bɔn: naaso
column4: meserɛ wo
column5: afei hyɛ me enyimnyam wɔ me man mpanyimfo na Israel enyim
column7: ma monkɔsɔr EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn no."

column2: "Nna Samuel sanee kedzii Saul ekyir bio na Saul kɔsɔɔr EWURADZE."

column3: Hom mfa Amalekfo hen Agag no mbrɛ me ha. Na Agag baa ne nkyɛn enyigye mu. Na Agag see dɛ
column4: Ampa owu no wenwen no etwa mu kɔ."

column3: Dɛ mbrɛ w’afona ama mbaa ahwer mba no
column4: dɛmara so na wo na bɔhwer mba wɔ mbaa mu. Na Samuel twitwaa Agag esinesin wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ Gilgal."

column2: "Na Samuel sii mu kɔr Rama; na Saul so sii mu kɔr ne fie wɔ Gibea."
"Na Samuel ennhu Saul bio araa ma okodur dɛ ɔdze kɔr owu mu; naaso Samuel dzii awerɛhow wɔ Saul ho. Na EWURADZE nuu noho dɛ ɔhyɛɛ Saul hen wɔ Israel do."
